content.question: Directions: Suggested time - 25 minutes. It is recommended that you spend 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline your answer. Identify TWO specific means by which new expressions in popular culture are diffused globally. Popular culture often spreads through a combination of different types of diffusion. Describe how terms, such as those shown in the table, diffuse spatially through each of the following processes. Relocation diffusion Contagious diffusion Hierarchical diffusion When new words diffuse, they confront barriers. Identify and explain TWO barriers to diffusion that are often encountered even as new terms become more popular.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
